DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the comfort of a glaucoma therapy in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Study of a Glaucoma Therapy to Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Adults of either sex and any race diagnosed with openangle glaucoma (with or without pseudoexfoliation or pigment dispersion component) Under 18
